guildId: needed if you wanna test it out in your own server first in development mode
NODE_ENV: 'development' (for tinkering with it locally) OR 'production' (for using the whole thing in a docker image)
ngrokURL: needed if you are trying it locally for Spotify callback host
serverURL: if you have a publicly available IP you are hosting it on

lavalink.password: any value, must match the one in application.yml

redis.port: should be 6379, but if running locally use 3333 to match docker-compose file

mongodb.url: url to your mongodb database, should start with mongodb+srv://
